analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo
analyzed: na saraṇam na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ hetu

original: ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke
analyzed: ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu
analyzed: na saraṇam na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca

original: saraṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: saraṇaḥ sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā
dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
